1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2011, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing mod_offline* modules
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(sic_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   13: 
   14: -define(NS_SIC, <<"urn:xmpp:sic:1">>).
   15: 
   16: %%%===================================================================
   17: %%% Suite configuration
   18: %%%===================================================================
   19: 
   20: all() ->
   21:     [{group, mod_sic_tests}].
   22: 
   23: all_tests() ->
   24:     [user_sic, forbidden_user_sic].
   25: 
   26: groups() ->
   27:     [{mod_sic_tests, [sequence], all_tests()}].
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
   31: 
   32: %%%===================================================================
   33: %%% Init & teardown
   34: %%%===================================================================
   35: 
   36: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   37:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config0),
   38:     escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   39: 
   40: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   41:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}),
   42:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(mod_offline_tests, Config) ->
   45:     start_module(mod_sic, []),
   46:     Config;
   47: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_group(mod_offline_tests, _Config) ->
   51:     stop_module(mod_sic);
   52: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   56:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   57: 
   58: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   59:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   60: 
   61: %%%===================================================================
   62: %%% offline tests
   63: %%%===================================================================
   64: 
   65: %% Retrieve my IP
   66: user_sic(Config) ->
   67:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
   68:         %% Alice sends a SIC IQ stanza
   69:         escalus:send(Alice, sic_iq_get()),
   70:         %% Alice expects IQ result with client IP address
   71:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   72:         escalus:assert(is_sic_response(), Stanza)
   73:     end).
   74: 
   75: %% Try to retrieve other user's IP
   76: forbidden_user_sic(Config) ->
   77:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
   78:         %% Alice sends a SIC IQ stanza to get Bob's IP
   79:         escalus:send(Alice, sic_iq_get(bob)),
   80:         %% Alice should get <forbidden/> error
   81:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   82:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"auth">>, <<"forbidden">>], Stanza)
   83:     end).
   84: 
   85: %%%===================================================================
   86: %%% Custom predicates
   87: %%%===================================================================
   88: 
   89: is_sic_response() ->
   90:     fun(Stanza) ->
   91:         escalus_pred:is_iq(<<"result">>, Stanza)
   92:         andalso
   93:         ?NS_SIC == exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"address">>}, {attr, <<"xmlns">>}])
   94:         andalso
   95:         <<"127.0.0.1">> == exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"address">>}, {element, <<"ip">>}, cdata])
   96:         andalso
   97:         is_binary(exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"address">>}, {element, <<"port">>}, cdata]))
   98:     end.
   99: 
  100: %%%===================================================================
  101: %%% Helpers
  102: %%%===================================================================
  103: 
  104: start_module(ModuleName, Options) ->
  105:     Args = [ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain), ModuleName, Options],
  106:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, start_module, Args).
  107: 
  108: stop_module(ModuleName) ->
  109:     Args = [ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain), ModuleName],
  110:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, stop_module, Args).
  111: 
  112: sic_iq_get() ->
  113:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
  114:         name = <<"address">>,
  115:         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, ?NS_SIC}],
  116:         children = []
  117:     }]).
  118: 
  119: sic_iq_get(To) ->
  120:     escalus_stanza:to(sic_iq_get(), To).
